subject: [PATCH v4 19/25] fuse: add io-uring kernel-managed buffer ring

reviews.author: Joanne Koong
reviews.summary: Made a minor suggestion to add a comment for clarity and agreed to update it. Also pointed out that no ring entry is used when there's no payload, but this was already handled in fuse_uring_prep_buffer().

2026-02-26.patch_summary: The patch adds kernel-managed buffer ring support for io-uring in the FUSE filesystem.
